p: The same tissues examined for histopathology were sampled for viral titration. Tissue samples were weighed and homogenized in 3 ml of transport medium with a homogenizer (Kinematica Polytron, Lucerne, Switzerland). Ten-fold serial dilutions of all tissue homogenates and of the swab suspensions that were determined positive by RT-PCR were inoculated into MDCK cells in triplicate as described previously [46]. The minimal detectable titer was 10 0.8 TCID 50/ml.
